landingpage.title: {siteName}
landingpage.subtitle_1:
We're all looking for different kinds of connections – a companion, a partner, like-minded folks nearby, a teacher, a mentor, friends, a soulmate.

It's not always easy – we're scattered all over the country, in villages, towns, and remote homesteads. Sometimes it turns out, after ages, that we finally meet someone who lives just a couple of villages away, but our paths have never crossed. Or they're in the next apartment block, but you'd never know they're also hunting for a small farm and binge-watching permaculture videos on YouTube.

{siteName} is created and run by fellow Gaian volunteers with no profit motive. It is a safe space made to help us connect and find each other.
landingpage.socialize_1: Find travel companions, local friends, and like-minded souls nearby
landingpage.date_1: Meet a soulmate, a partner, or someone to share the journey with

auth.otp_sent_phone: We have sent you a little code to your phone number, please enter it below.

blocklist.title: Blocked users
blocklist.unblock_confirmation: Are you sure you want to unblock this user?
blocklist.dialog_message_1: If this person is bothering you, you can block them. This will prevent them from sending you messages or interacting with your profile. They will also not be shown to you anywhere on this site, as if they never existed.
blocklist.dialog_message_2: They will not receive any notification that you have blocked them.

browse.no_access_dating_title: Your own dating profile is currently private.
browse.no_access_dating_description: When others can't see you, you can't see them - it's only fair.  To find matches, please make your dating profile public.
browse.no_access_social_title: Your own social profile is currently private.
browse.no_access_social_description: When others can't see you, you can't see them - it's only fair.  To see and meet others, please make your profile public.
browse.social_no_results: We haven't found anyone in {country} yet.
browse.social_no_results_tags: Haven't found anyone with those interests.
browse.no_results_cta_description: You can help by inviting your friends to join. The more, the merrier.
